name: lookup
javadoc:
/**
 * Escapes special characters in the given key using XML 1.0 escaping rules.
 *
 * @param key the key to escape
 * @return the escaped key
 */
improved_javadoc:
/**
 * Escapes special characters in the given key according to XML 1.0 escaping rules, 
 * replacing special characters with their corresponding entity references.
 *
 * @param key the key containing special characters to be escaped
 * @return the key with all special characters replaced by their XML entity references
 */
